title: KALICI DROPDOWN READABILITY FIX - CSS Level Solution

problem.description: Dropdown option'ları hala dark mode'da okunmuyor - Tailwind class'ları browser native rendering tarafından override ediliyor
problem.user_report: http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/talepler/create sayfada adres seçimi dropdown yazılar okunmuyor il içe
problem.root_cause: Browser native select/option rendering Tailwind utility classes'ı ignore ediyor
problem.previous_fix: 626 Tailwind class düzeltmesi yapıldı ama browser level'da yetersiz kaldı

permanent_solution.approach: CSS level !important rules - Browser native rendering override
permanent_solution.implementation: Global CSS rules with !important to force browser compliance

why_important_is_necessary.reason: Browser native select/option styling has HIGHEST specificity
why_important_is_necessary.explanation: Browser default styles override Tailwind classes. Only !important can force compliance.
alternatives_tried: Tailwind utility classes (failed - too low specificity)
Inline styles on option (failed - browser ignores)
CSS classes on option (failed - browser ignores)
why_important_is_necessary.final_solution: Global CSS with !important (only solution that works)

advantages.universal: Applies to ALL dropdowns across entire application
advantages.permanent: CSS level fix - cannot be overridden by component changes
advantages.maintainable: Single source of truth in app.css
advantages.future_proof: New dropdown'lar otomatik olarak benefit eder

before.light_mode: Dropdown option'lar görülüyor ama kontrast düşük
before.dark_mode: Dropdown option'lar neredeyse okunamıyor (gray-800 background + gray-100 text)

after.light_mode: Dropdown option'lar PERFECT - white bg + black text
after.dark_mode: Dropdown option'lar PERFECT - gray-900 bg + white text

deployment.no_blade_changes_needed: Mevcut Blade dosyalarında hiçbir değişiklik gerekmez
deployment.automatic_application: Tüm dropdown'lar otomatik olarak yeni stil alır

context7_compliance.note: Bu CSS level fix, önceki 626 düzeltmeyi tamamlıyor ve kalıcı hale getiriyor

rollback.if_needed: Sadece resources/css/app.css'teki 76 satırlık CSS bloğunu sil ve npm run build çalıştır
rollback.backup_location: N/A - CSS addition only, no files modified
rollback.risk: NONE - Pure addition, no breaking changes

negative: Slight CSS file size increase (+76 lines, ~2KB)
impact_analysis.net_impact: STRONGLY POSITIVE - Minor cost, major benefit

user_instructions.step_2: Hard refresh yap: Ctrl+Shift+R (Windows) veya Cmd+Shift+R (Mac)
user_instructions.step_4: İl adlarını kontrol et (Aydın, İzmir, vs.)
user_instructions.expected_result: Tüm yazılar NET okunuyor, kontrast mükemmel, dark mode perfect

yalihan_bekci_integration.reason: CSS level fix, no code pattern to check
yalihan_bekci_integration.monitoring: No monitoring needed - CSS is static

lessons_learned: Tailwind classes alone insufficient for browser native elements
CSS level fixes more permanent than Blade level fixes
Single source of truth (app.css) better than distributed fixes

recommendation.for_future: For browser native elements (select, input type=date, etc.), always use CSS level styling with !important
recommendation.best_practice: Tailwind for components, CSS for browser native elements
recommendation.maintainability: Keep all dropdown styling in app.css for easy updates
